if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {

return ”;

return input.trim();

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won’t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won’t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ●Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ●Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ●Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ●Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ●No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

JUSTTOP Windshield Cleaning Tool, Car Window Cleaner with Unbreakable Extendable Long-Reach Handle and Washable Reusable Microfiber Cloth, Car Exterior Accessories, Green
Extendable Handle: The extendable handle not only contains the soft sponge cover to ensure your comfort when cleaning the window; but also the adjustable length of the handle also makes it easier to clean the vehicle glass. The handle is 9.45-15.35 inch and whole cleaner is 10.83-16.73 inch, which is long enough to allow you to clean any position of the car glass.
180°Swiveled Triangular Head: Designed with pivoting Square head to make a complete contact to the glass, which can be rotated 180 degrees to fit the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, easy to use and effortless.
Removable Microfiber Cloth Pads: The car window cleaner includes 3 pieces of microfiber pads for easy replacement, wet and dry use. The towel is made of soft microfiber and the surface of the fabric is finely treated , which must clean your vehicle well and never cause streaking after cleaning.
Wide Application: The windshield cleaner is great for all size cars, SUV, trucks, Jeeps, UTVs, ATVs and so on. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.
Easy Use: Simply slip one of the microfiber cloth cover on the head, spray with water, and start washing.

Classic comfort gets a modern update. Crafted with breathable microsuede and temperature-regulating definition adapt technology, these clogs are the perfect pick for relaxing around the house or on the go. Durable indoor/outdoor outsoles add an extra touch of versatility.

클래식한 편안함은 현대적인 업데이트를 제공합니다. 통기성이 좋은 마이크로스웨이드와 온도 조절 정의 적응 기술로 제작된 이 클로그는 집에서나 이동 중에도 휴식을 취할 수 있는 완벽한 제품입니다. 내구성이 뛰어난 실내/실외 밑창은 다용도로 사용할 수 있습니다.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.97 x 9.65 x 4.92 inches; 7.2 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 30871-00001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 6, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Dearfoams
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07W7N9245

Imported
Thermoplastic Rubbers sole
Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
CLASSIC MEETS MODERN: Dearfoams Men’s Memory Foam Clog Slippers feature cozy twill or microsuede uppers paired with whipstitch detailing for classic comfort with a modern update; Kick back and relax while you enjoy the cozy comfort!
MEMORY FOAM INSOLE: Each slipper is fitted with a multi-density cushioned insole and memory foam for a cloud-like feeling on your feet; Whether you’re lounging on the couch or running to get the mail these slippers offer premium comfort & durability!
RUBBER OUTSOLE: With an indoor/outdoor outsole the bottom of these clog slippers features molded thermoplastic rubber for added durability and constant support whether you’re on the go or at home!

Read more

The Ultimate Comfort Experience

Unbeatable Comfort

Dearfoams is known for soft, warm fabrics and memory foam cushioning. A wide range of styles and sizes means you can find a slipper specifically crafted for all your needs!

Timeless Style

A mix of timeless looks and fresh, fashion-forward designs means there’s a slipper to fit every style. Perfect for wearing indoors at home or outdoors in the yard!

Dependable Quality

Superior materials and innovative technologies ensure a level of fit and durability that only Dearfoams can deliver.

Read more

Designed From The Ground Up For Comfort and Convenience

Indoor/Outdoor Outsole

With a rubber sole, our slippers can be worn indoors while lounging around the house or outdoors to grab the mail or walk the dog. Stylish and reliable, these cozy slippers are the best choice when it comes to comfortable and durable house wear.

Memory Foam Cushioning

Dearfoams slippers are designed with a multi-density cushioned insole with memory foam, bringing you instant comfort and relaxation.

No Sweat Comfort

Cool meets cozy with Dearfoams DF Adapt: No Sweat Comfort. Cool and fresh technology regulates foot temperature providing ultimate comfort all day long!

Machine Washable

Cleaning your Dearfoams slippers is easy! For best results, machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle and lay flat to dry. Keep your favorite slippers feeling clean and fresh all year long!

Read more

Give The Gift Of Comfort

We all know how hard it can be to shop for men, whether it’s your husband, father, son, boyfriend or bestie. With a wide selection of styles, colors, and sizes, you can’t go wrong with a pair of Dearfoams slippers. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, anniversary, holidays or just because! Dearfoams slippers are the perfect gift to slip right into!

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $21.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:50:41 UTC – Details)


One of the most essential items in dog accessories and for all those Pet parents who want to give a relaxing bath experience to their furballs.

SIZE AND COLOR
● Comes in a pack of 2
● Available in brown and grey shades to choose from
● Aptly measured to size 24″ wide x 40″ long for easy drying without stressing hands
● Our dog bath towel size is a perfect fit for small to medium-sized animals

EXCELLENT QUALITY
● Crafted with the perfect blend of 80% polyester and 20% polyamide for ultimate softness and coziness
● Highly durable and does not fade or deform after multiple washes
● Super absorbent, soak water quickly and keep your dog calm and relaxed
● Lightweight, easy on hands
● Fur-friendly material helps in quick drying without leaving a “wet doggy” odor

DUAL POCKETS
● Our durable dog towel comes with 2 triangular 7″ x 7.21″ pockets for strong grip to dry your dog’s underbelly and legs
● Its soft and durable microfiber material gently massage and give natural skin warmth to your pooch

MULTI-PURPOSE
● Our fine quality drying towels for dogs is ideal to wick out moisture from your pets after bath, swimming or shower
● Can be used in your pets crate to keep them cozy and warm

EASY TO WASH
● Can be launder easily in machine using cold water and mild soap
● Tumble dry on low temperature and gentle cycles
● Do not use bleach
● Do not iron
● Keep away from fire

PRODUCT SPECIFICATION
● Package Includes: 2 Dog drying towel
● Package Weight: 14.07 oz
● Package Size: 12.71 x 10.91 x 2.76 inches
● Product size: 24″ wide and 40″ long
● Color: Grey and Brown
● Material: 80% polyester and 20% polyamide
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.71 x 10.91 x 2.76 inches; 14.07 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 8, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PAWPUP
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B094GDZN3V

Pet Friendly Material – Made with 80% polyester and 20% polyamide, our personalized dog towels blends softness and durability for an ideal bath experience for your dog; Extremely absorbent and large enough to make drying quicker and easier
Dual Pockets – Unlike others, our microfibre dog drying towel has 2 pockets for easy grip; Soft, sturdy and gives natural skin warmth to calm your pet
Multitude Usage – Either use it as a pet towel or make it an ideal comfort item for your pet’s kennel to keep them warm and cozy; It’s super soft and glides smoothly on the wet skin to help your furry friends dry quickly
Easy to Wash – Our easy to clean dog towels for drying dogs can be conveniently washed in machine using mild detergents to always keep it clean and ready for your dog’s next grooming session; Tumble dry on gentle cycle

4.5
Price: $21.99 - $16.99

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:20:53 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Application of Auto Windshield Cleaning Tool :

1. Car windshield cleaner tool are great works as a fog & moisture removal tool.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.

Windshield Inside Cleaning Tool Specifications:

Material: Aluminum Alloy / Plastic ( ABS ), Microfiber

Brush Length: 63.98cm / 25.19 inch

Brush Head: 15 x 10cm / 5.9 x 3.9 inch

Triangular Brush Head: 13 x 14.5cm / 5.1 x 5.7 inch

Maximum Flip Angle: 180°

Covers Head Color: Yellow, Grey, Blue

Reusable Microfiber Pads：

Car windshield cleaner tool come come with 4pcs washable & reusable cloth (2x yellow+1x grey+1x blue), they are made of microfiber fine fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective, and never cause streaking after cleaning.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Install Instruction:

1. Hold the ergonomic non-slip part with one hand(Note: Don’t wear the ergonomic side upside, it should be downside install).

2. Hold the bottom of windshield cleaner with one hand and hold the top of the handle with the other hand, turn left the long handle to extend the handle.

3. Hold the middle black part and hold the handle with the other hand and than turn right to tightened it.

4. Use two finger to hold the cylindrical button, slowly push in to install the handle.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Package Includes:

1 X Extendable Handle

1X Detachable Rectangle Panel

1X Detachable Triangle Panel

4 X Microfiber Cloth (2pcs Yellow+1pcs Grey+1pcs Blue)

1 X Empty Bottle

【High Quality】The handle of the windshield cleaning tool is made of aluminum alloy material, sturdy and reliable, not easy to break and deform. And comes with 4pcs washable & reusable pads (2xyellow + 1xgrey + 1xblue) the cloth that are made of strong water absorption coral fleece fabricty never causes streaking after cleaning.
【180° Rotating Head Design】Our car window cleaner designed with 180° Pivoting& Rotating Head-helps to provide better leverage and full contact to all surfaces to remove troublesome gunk in the corner of windshield, ideal for car interior & exterior cleaning.
【Easy to Use】The windshield cleaner with the extendable handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. Do not need any soap to clean the pads, just only water, it would be clean the fogs, stains, dust ,dirt on the glass, even clean the windshield corner easily!
【Multiple Uses】Car windshield cleaner tool is an ideal choice for dehumidification and demisting of windshield glass. Our inside windshield cleaner tool come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks, and also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls, to meet your different household cleaning needs.
【Package Includes】Our windshield cleaning tool inside come with 1pcs extendable handle and 2pcs detachable panel (1pcs square panel+1pcs triangle panel ) and 4pcs microfiber cover cloths (2pcs yellow+1pcs grey+1pcs blue) and a small spray bottle.

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Tool：

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.
